participant_2.background:
I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
i love to clean.
i drive a fast sports car.
I like to pet my cat to relieve stress and forget about the day.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
Hey! Not too bad, just got home from work. Yours?
Not so bad. Just got back from a show with my band. We played in a coffee shop.
That sounds fun! I've always wanted to play in a band.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be a lot of work too.
I'm sure it is. Do you have any other hobbies besides playing in a band?
I play guitar on my own sometimes. I also like to clean.
Cleaning is therapeutic! I love cleaning.
It is. It helps me de-stress.
Me too. I also like to go for drives to relieve stress.
I like to go for drives too. But I don't have a car, so I usually take the bus.
I drive a fast sports car. It's really fun to drive.
That sounds fun! I've always wanted to drive a fast car.
You should try it sometime. It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the advice.
